general.name: Office C2R Update Status
general.description: Checks the current installed version and if it is less than X days out of date, it will report as current. Also reports details about the C2R channel and version/build information.

variable.name: FailUnsupported
variable.description: Fail the script if an unsupported C2R channel is in use.

variable.name: FailNonC2R
variable.description: Fail the script if a non-C2R install of Office is found.
